price: Ese ntiwamenye (yewe Muhamadi) ba bandi bigira abere? Nyamara Allah yeza uwo ashaka, kandi ntibazahuguzwa (ibyiza bakoze) kabone n’iyo byaba Fatiila.[1]
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُمۚ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يُزَكِّي مَن يَشَآءُ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا
footnotes: [1] Fatiila: umuzi muto ungana n’akadodo uba mu rubuto rw’itende

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yuzakkūna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakkī man yashāu walā yuẓ'lamūna fatīlan
translations: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
